verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Jonath-elem-rechokim, <S%H3128><s%> Michtam <S%H4387><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H270><s%> him in Gath. <S%H1661><s%> Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me, O God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> man <S%H582><s%> would swallow me up; <S%H7602><s%> he fighting <S%H3898><s%> daily <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> oppresseth <S%H3905><s%> me.

Mine enemies <S%H8324><s%> would daily <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> swallow me up: <S%H7602><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they be many <S%H7227><s%> that fight <S%H3898><s%> against me, O thou most High. <S%H4791><s%>
What time <S%H3117><s%> I am afraid, <S%H3372><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will trust <S%H982><s%> in <S%H413><s%> thee.

In God <S%H430><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> his word, <S%H1697><s%> in God <S%H430><s%> I have put my trust; <S%H982><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> can do <S%H6213><s%> unto me.
Every <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they wrest <S%H6087><s%> my words: <S%H1697><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are against <S%H5921><s%> me for evil. <S%H7451><s%>

They gather themselves together, <S%H1481><s%> they hide <S%H6845><s%> themselves, they <S%H1992><s%> mark <S%H8104><s%> my steps, <S%H6119><s%> when <S%H834><s%> they wait for <S%H6960><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
Shall they <S%H3926><s%> escape <S%H6403><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> iniquity? <S%H205><s%> in thine anger <S%H639><s%> cast down <S%H3381><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> O God. <S%H430><s%>
Thou tellest <S%H5608><s%> my wanderings: <S%H5112><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> my tears <S%H1832><s%> into thy bottle: <S%H4997><s%> are they not <S%H3808><s%> in thy book? <S%H5612><s%>

When <S%H3117><s%> I cry <S%H7121><s%> unto thee, then <S%H227><s%> shall mine enemies <S%H341><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> back: <S%H268><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> I know; <S%H3045><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is for me.
In God <S%H430><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> his word: <S%H1697><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will I praise <S%H1984><s%> his word. <S%H1697><s%>
In God <S%H430><s%> have I put my trust: <S%H982><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> be afraid <S%H3372><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> man <S%H120><s%> can do <S%H6213><s%> unto me.
Thy vows <S%H5088><s%> are upon <S%H5921><s%> me, O God: <S%H430><s%> I will render <S%H7999><s%> praises <S%H8426><s%> unto thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4194><s%> wilt not <S%H3808><s%> thou deliver my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1762><s%> that I may walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in the light <S%H216><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
